metadata.title: CVE-2021-4216 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - low
metadata.description:
A Floating point exception (division-by-zero) flaw was found in Mupdf forzero width pages in muraster.c. It is fixed in Mupdf-1.20.0-rc1 upstream.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4216` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.20.3+ds1-1
mupdf-tools - 1.20.3+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.20.3+ds1-1').
